name: Making Galvanized Steel
pages: Galvanized Steel is not an alloy. Its steel with zinc plating and other compounds. Its used on a big number of recipes, all of them necessary for your progression.$(br2)To make Galvanized steel you will need to progress in the game at least until you have a steady supply of zinc and iron.

As Galvanized Steel is not an alloy it can't be melted back, zinc has a melting point much lower than iron or steel and it would boil away before the iron or steel could melt.$(br2)However it can be welded and made into sheets.

pages.title: Welding
pages.text: One of the ways to get Galvanized Steel ingots is to weld a zinc sheet with a zinc ingot.

pages.title: Spout
pages.text: A more resource effective way to make Galvanized Steel is to apply molten Zinc to a Wrought Iron ingot using the Spout, this way you can get 4 Galvanized Steel ingots from 1 Zinc ingot.
